channel.title: Legacy 317 Help please!

item.title: Legacy 317 Help please!
item.dc:creator: @Twd1995 Twd1995
item.description:
@Twd1995 wrote:

Hello I Downloaded The source and Client on the Downloads page called = Legacy 317 ON RUNE-Server. I was able to make a jar file with the localhost and I’m able to get on it. But I had someone add me on skype and he said all I gotta do is change the ip in … PLEASE HELP ME IF YOU HAVE THE SOURCE AND CLIENT AND HAVE GOTTEN IT ONLINE!

Configuration.java

public class Configuration {

/*

  • Our default server host is “ddns2244.ddns.net”;
    */

public static final String SERVER_IP = " MY NO-IP DOMAIN IS HERE!";
public final static String LOCAL_HOST = “localhost”;

//public static String server = SERVER_IP;

public static int worldId = 1;

public static int portId = 43594;

public final static double CLIENT_VERSION = 8.9;

public final static String CLIENT_NAME = “Legacy”;

public static boolean smoothShading = true;

public static String getCapitalized(String string) {
if(string.length() < 1)
return string;
String firstCharacter = string.substring(0, 1);
String remainder = string.substring(1, string.length());
return firstCharacter.toUpperCase() + remainder;
}
}

He Explained to me that’s all I needed to change for me to make a jar file so my buddys could get online with me but I did that and I made the jar file and it still say error connecting to server please help me!!!
Skype=tyty43095
